Poor Tabs‚Ä¶ He was slightly confused about the overall gist of the festivities. I think he thought it was a get-together to celebrate him. html:
That little girl in the picture above turned nine years old today.

Yup, today is Connor Claire‚Äôs ninth birthday!

Wow.

I remember that day up there like it was yesterday. Poor Tabs‚Ä¶ He was slightly confused about the overall gist of the festivities.

I think he thought it was a get-together to celebrate him.

We didn‚Äôt want to burst his bubble, so we took a brief interlude to sing him the birthday song. ‚ÄúHappy birthday to you! Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday, dear tabby‚Ä¶ Happy birthday to you!‚Äù üôÇ

Connor Claire didn‚Äôt mind, and there was more than enough food, fun and love for everyone.

It was kind of weird, but for the most part, Tabs wasn‚Äôt as social as he usually is. He spent most of the afternoon napping at the top of the stairs, away from the party.

I checked in on him from time to time and gave him chin scratches and whispered that I love him.

Maybe he thought that his toddler assistant deserved to be the center of attention for once. I don‚Äôt know, but I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if that was it. After all, he was a very conscientious tabby. üôÇ

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

P.S. Oh, and here‚Äôs Connor Claire now, a dancing nine year old. üôÇ
